concept.title: A Guide to Cooking the Perfect Steak Indoors
concept.shortdesc: With some thoughtful planning, high quality beef, the right equipment, and proper technique, achieving steakhouse quality steaks at home is easily within the home cooks' abilities.

conbody.p: Quality steak is expensive, and after spending $30 a pound for dry aged ribeyes, the last thing cooks want to do is cook it wrong and hammer their steaks, cooking them well done when they were shooting for medium rare.
This is a straightforward guide to help avoid common pitfalls and achieve steaks that approach what they serve at Morton's and The Palm.
